text: You add your level to your Dodge bonus while equipped with armor with the \lq Heavy \rq descriptor.
Additionally, while wearing such armor, you gain a Skill Bonus to Damage Resistance against blunt, cutting and piercing of +1.
You gain a +{{oldRank}}d4 Skill Bonus on Dodge checks, a +{{oldRank}} Skill Bonus to Lower, and a +{{conditionalText[0]}} Skill Bonus to Higher Dodge.
